text:
Heavy is the head that wears the crown...

Day 1 of the Nintendo Treehouse: Live | Nintendo Switch 2 continues: https://ninten.do/6011qS0Wz
DROP THE PRICE OR FACE BOYCOTT
$80 for a video game is tone deaf. Do the right thing Nintendo. We barely tolerated $70 for TOTK

I want to be as polite as possible here but if going from $60 to $80 for an item you buy once and play for 30+ hours is that big of a financial burden, you need to be looking for better work. You shouldn’t even look in the direction of a new game console if $20 is so vital.

Im going to leave this here

More games, lower prices

Im going to leave this here

More games, lower prices
dont waste your money people. If youre going to spend 650 bucks, save a little more for a console. Dont let nintendo rip you off.
Lost a literal life long customer due to your greed. I know the shills will pay $80-$90 a game I'm sure not good luck
Youre not getting my money this time Nintendo. Lost a heavy Switch spender and physical game collector on this console. Good luck!
$80 for a $60 worth game? And that it’s not even on the cart itself so you technically don’t even own it? DROP THE PRICE
For the babies in the room and that was the 90s with minimum wage under 5.25 that is nothing now.
Remember guys this is the same company that is charging for a tech demo on how to use the switch 2....
Looking more and more less likely this has split screen - the more we see, the more I second guess preordering.
